title: 44.5 (LOA)
content:
Kordo slaps you on the back, the friendly gesture sending you staggering forward a few steps. “Alright,” he says. “Thrush has you on plenty of important tasks, and I don’t want to distract you from them. We’ll share another hunt someday soon!”

You say goodbye, and watch the old veteran stride off, whistling an old hiking tune.

Discard Kordo. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
